author: andreas
content: Flo, don't misunderstand me. That's OK, but look at the feuds among performers who use "authentic" instruments or perform using "authentic time intervals". Many try to kindle interest by saying that they present the "original" version as intended by the composer. Sometimes the reasoning is sound, sometimes it is not, but it's still speculation to a certain degree. Please hear what you like to hear, please compose what you like to compose ðŸ™‚
